title: When I click on the bottom search bar and type in an application name like Waze or chase it often
content:
When I type in an application name in the bottom search box like Waze or maps it often doesn't bring up any results. when I repeat the action it shows me what I am looking for

This has been actually happening over the last 6 months and across different software updates

Is anybody else noticing the same behavior

Thx
